ExportItemConfig.Query:
SELECT id, order_no, member_id, partner_id, shop_id, replace(items_info,'\n','
') as items_info, total_fee, fee, pay_fee, payment_opt, is_paid, note, status, paid_time, create_time, deliver_time, update_time FROM pt_order WHERE partner_id={partner_id} AND ({status}>99 OR status={status}) ORDER BY update_time DESC,create_time desc LIMIT {page_start},{page_size}
ExportItemConfig.Total: SELECT COUNT(0) FROM pt_order WHERE partner_id={partner_id} AND ({status}>99 OR status={status})
